hadiths.text: It was narrated that Al-Bara' bin 'Azib said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] enjoined seven things upon us, and forbade seven things for us. He forbade to us gold rings, silver vessels, Al-Mayathir, Al-Qassiyah, Al-Istabraq, Ad-Dibaj, and silk

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ النَّهْىِ عَنِ الثِّيَابِ الْقِسِّيَّةِ،
